title: Baked Cheese Grits
ingredients: 2 cups yellow grits (not quick or instant)
instructions: Bring water and 2 1/4 tsp salt to boil in 4 qt heavy pot.
Add grits in a slow stream, stirring constantly.
Reduce heat and gently simmer, until very thick, about 30 mins (use a long-handled spoon to avoid bubbling & popping hot grits).
Add butter, remaining 1 1/2 tsp salt, pepper, garlic, and cheese, stirring until butter and cheese are melted. Lightly beat eggs and milk in a small bowl, then stir into grits until combined.
Pour into ungreased 3 qt graze baking dish (2 inches deep).
Bake until set and lightly browned, about an hour.
